DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of Nexium in the treatment of subjects with persistent asthma believed to have acid reflux as a contributory factor to control of their asthma.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of asthma Forced Expiratory Volume and Peak Expiratory Flow as defined by the protocol Daily use of inhaled GCS and/or leukotriene pathway modifier for greater than 3 months. Severe heartburn 3 days/week during the runin period. Subjects with a history of 3 sinus infections treated with antibiotics in the year prior to Visit 1. Any other significant disease or pathology judged to be clinically significant by the investigator
